Title: The Reaping
Writer: Carey W. Hayes (screenplay), Chad Hayes (screenplay), Brian Rousso (story)
Actors: Hilary Swank, David Morrissey, Idris Elba, AnnaSophia Robb
Plot: The death of a child in mysterious circumstances sparks a series of events that seem to represent biblical plagues, which start occurring in, of all places, a town called "Haven" that is located deep in the bowels of Bible belt country in the bayous of Louisiana. A former Christian missionary turned religious phenomena debunker and her top open minded student turned personal assistant are sent to investigate.
Production: Dark Castle Entertainment, Village Roadshow Entertainment
